reference.name: fastvst~
reference.description: The fastvst~ object is currently a basic skeleton for testing purposes. It features 16 signal inlets and 16 signal outlets and provides a simple plug message for console logging.

inlet.description: Accepts control messages and audio input for the first channel.
Audio input for the second channel.

outlet.description: Audio output for the first channel.
Audio output for the second channel.

message.name: plug
message.description: Logs the provided path (if any) to the Max console.

attribute.name: log
attribute.description: Enables or disables verbose logging to the Max console.
